extracted_playbook.title: Identify Affected System and Version
extracted_playbook.description: Check if the system is affected by retrieving the installed firmware version and configurations.

extracted_playbook.condition: Is the system affected by the vulnerability?

extracted_playbook.title: Update Firmware
extracted_playbook.description: Update to the latest firmware version according to the provided table to mitigate the vulnerability.

extracted_playbook.title: Apply General Security Best Practices
extracted_playbook.description: Use general security best practices to protect systems from local and network attacks. Do not allow direct access to the device from untrusted networks.

extracted_playbook.title: Implement Defense-in-Depth Strategy
extracted_playbook.description: Ensure that industrial control systems (ICS) are not directly accessible from the Internet and are protected by a defense-in-depth strategy.

extracted_playbook.title: Consult BSI ICS Security Compendium
extracted_playbook.description: Refer to the BSI ICS Security Compendium for general information on securing ICS.

extracted_playbook.title: Restrict Network Access
extracted_playbook.description: Ensure that the device is not accessible from untrusted networks and apply network segmentation where possible.
